stories.title: Project initialization and base setup
stories.description: Bootstrap a Next.js 16 app with TypeScript, Tailwind v4, shadcn/ui, and SQLite persistence. Establish the minimal, borderless design system with automatic light/dark mode support.
acceptance: Next.js 16 app created with App Router and TypeScript using `bunx create-next-app@latest app --ts --tailwind --eslint --app --src-dir --use-bun --yes`
Biome configured for linting and formatting using `cd app && bun add -d @biomejs/biome && bunx @biomejs/biome init`
Tailwind v4 configured with CSS variables for light/dark mode via prefers-color-scheme
shadcn/ui initialized with `bunx shadcn@latest init` using borderless, minimal theme customization
SQLite database setup with better-sqlite3 and Drizzle ORM
Database schema created for journal entries (id, date, content, prompt, createdAt, updatedAt)
Typography scale established using clamp() for fluid sizing (display, heading, body, caption)
Base layout uses dynamic viewport units (dvh, svh) for mobile-first full-screen experience
Whimsical serif font loaded for headings, clean sans-serif for body text

stories.title: Daily journal entry editor
stories.description: Create the core writing experience - a full-screen, distraction-free editor that saves automatically. One entry per calendar day, seamlessly creating or editing based on the current date.
acceptance: Full-viewport editor with no visible chrome or borders
Auto-save triggers on pause (debounced 1s) and blur events
Date displayed prominently using typographic hierarchy at top of screen
Textarea grows with content, minimum height 60vh on mobile
Placeholder text fades gracefully when typing begins
Loading state shows subtle skeleton, not spinner
Entry persists to SQLite via API route on save
Keyboard dismissal on mobile doesn't cause layout shift
Works offline-first with optimistic UI updates

stories.title: Rotating daily writing prompts
stories.description: Display an optional, rotating prompt to inspire writing. Prompts change daily and can be dismissed or shown based on user preference.
acceptance: Pool of 30+ thoughtful, non-cheesy journal prompts stored in codebase
One prompt selected per day using date-based deterministic rotation
Prompt displays above editor in muted, smaller typography
Tap/click prompt to dismiss it for the session
Swipe up gesture on prompt area also dismisses
Dismissed state persists in localStorage for current day only
Prompt reappears on new day automatically
Empty state without prompt still feels complete and intentional

stories.title: Browse past journal entries
stories.description: A clean reading experience for reviewing past entries. Swipe-friendly navigation between days with elegant empty states for days without entries.
acceptance: History view accessible via subtle gesture or minimal nav element
Entries displayed in reverse chronological order as scrollable list
Each entry card shows date, prompt (if used), and content preview
Tap entry to open full reading view with large, comfortable typography
Swipe left/right in reading view to navigate between entries
Empty days show graceful empty state, not errors
Smooth page transitions with subtle fade/slide animations
Pull-to-refresh gesture loads latest entries on mobile

stories.title: Calendar-based entry navigation
stories.description: Visual calendar view showing which days have entries, allowing quick jumps to any date for reading or writing.
acceptance: Minimal calendar grid with current month displayed
Days with entries indicated by subtle dot or highlight
Tap any day to navigate to that entry (view or create)
Swipe between months fluidly
Today button for quick return to current date
Calendar overlays current view as modal/sheet on mobile
Respects system dark mode with appropriate date styling
Week starts on Sunday or Monday based on locale

stories.title: Full-text search across entries
stories.description: Search through all journal entries by content. Fast, local search with highlighted results.
acceptance: Search input accessible from history view
Real-time filtering as user types (debounced 300ms)
Results show matching entries with search term highlighted
Search queries content field using SQLite LIKE or FTS
Empty search state shows recent entries or suggestions
No results state is friendly and suggests trying different terms
Tap result navigates to full entry with search term still highlighted
Search input has clear button and keyboard submit support

stories.title: Export journal entries
stories.description: Allow users to export their journal data in portable formats for backup or migration purposes.
acceptance: Export option accessible from minimal settings/menu area
Export all entries as JSON with full metadata
Export all entries as Markdown with date headers
Export triggers native file download on all platforms
Export filename includes date range of entries
Progress indicator for large exports
Success confirmation with entry count exported
Export works offline using local SQLite data

stories.title: Touch gestures and mobile polish
stories.description: Implement swipe gestures and mobile-specific interactions that make the app feel native and fluid on touch devices.
acceptance: Swipe right from editor edge opens history view
Swipe left from history closes back to editor
Swipe between entries in reading mode with momentum
Pull down on editor dismisses keyboard on iOS/Android
Long-press on entry shows quick actions (delete, edit date)
Haptic feedback on gesture completions where supported
All gestures have visual affordances showing drag progress
Gestures disabled when text is selected to prevent conflicts
